attributes.action: Make the serving of drink in glass glasses and glass bottles in licensed premises illegal and encourage the immediate introduction of plastic and polycarbonate bottles and glasses in an attempt to reduce injury caused by glass.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Every year, hundreds of people are injured because of accident, or deliberate attack with glasses and glass bottles.

These items are regularly used as weapons and the compulsory introduction of polycarbonate glasses and bottles would reduce these injuries considerable.

Please support this campaign to help protect customers in licensed premises, and the Door Supervisors who are there to safeguard their security and welfare.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
